unknown_test.comment: This test must be performed manually.
This test must be performed manually.
This test must be performed manually.
This test must be performed manually.

vmhost_vib_test.comment: Ensure the 'AcceptanceLevel' of VIBs is not equal to 'CommunitySupported'

vmhost_acceptancelevel_test.comment: Ensure the VM Host's Software Acceptance Policy is not equal to 'CommunitySupported'

vmhost_module_test.comment: Ensure the "SignedStatus" property of all modules is equals to "VMware Signed"

vmhost_ntpserver_test.comment: Ensure at least one qualified NTP Server exists

vmhost_firewallexception_test.comment: Ensure the 'AllowedHosts.AllIP' property of all network service firewall exceptions is equals to 'false'

vmhost_webserverssl_test.comment: Ensure the host's SSL certificates are valid

vmhost_advancedsetting_test.comment: Ensure 'Syslog.global.logDir' is pattern not match to 'scratch'
Ensure 'UserVars.ESXiShellInteractiveTimeOut' is less than or equal to '300'
Ensure 'UserVars.ESXiShellTimeOut' is less than or equal to '3660'

vmhost_coredump_test.comment: Ensure at least one qualified core dump server is configured

vmhost_account_test.comment: Ensure at least one qualified account exists

vmhost_service_test.comment: Ensure the 'DCUI' service's start policy is set to 'Off'
Ensure the 'TSM' service's start policy is set to 'Off'
Ensure the 'TSM-SSH' service's start policy is set to 'Off'

vmhost_busadapter_test.comment: Ensure the 'MutualChapEnabled' property of qualified iSCSI Bus Adapters is equals to 'true'

vmhost_vswitchpolicy_test.comment: Ensure the "forged_transmits" policy on all vSwitches is set to "Reject"
Ensure the "mac_changes" policy on all vSwitches is set to "Reject"
Ensure the "promiscuous_mode" policy on all vSwitches is set to "Reject"

virtual_portgroup_test.comment: Ensure the VLAN ID on all vSwitches is not equal to "1"
Ensure the VLAN ID on all vSwitches is not equal to "4095"

vm_advancedsetting_test.comment: Ensure 'tools.setInfo.sizeLimit' is less than or equal to '1048576'
Ensure 'log.keepOld' is less than or equal to '10'
Ensure 'log.rotateSize' is less than or equal to '1024000'

vm_device_test.comment: Ensure the 'floppy' device's "Connected" property is set to is 'false'
Ensure the 'cdrom' device's "Connected" property is set to is 'false'
Ensure the 'parallel_port' device's "Connected" property is set to is 'false'
Ensure the 'serial_port' device's "Connected" property is set to is 'false'
Ensure the 'usb' device's "Connected" property is set to is 'false'

vm_harddiskdevice_test.comment: Ensure the 'Persistence' property of qualified hard disks is not equal to 'NonPersistent'
Ensure the 'Persistence' property of qualified hard disks is not equal to 'IndependentNonPersistent'

vmhost_vib_object.comment: Ensure the 'AcceptanceLevel' of VIBs is not equal to 'CommunitySupported'

vmhost_acceptancelevel_object.comment: Ensure the VM Host's Software Acceptance Policy is not equal to 'CommunitySupported'

vmhost_module_object.comment: Ensure the "SignedStatus" property of all modules is equals to "VMware Signed"
